Text: So, just a heads up; I couldn't find the subtitles files in this download.

yeah, that seems to be very common with these unpacked releases. They somehow manage to remove the .sub file, but still claim there are subs included. That's what you get for free...
Subs are here: 
http://www.allsubs.org/subs-download/bibliothque-pascal-2010-subrip-2-5-english-subtitle-bibliotheque-lap-cd-1/3351672/
The subs are right in the folder titled, surprise surprise... "Subs" Guess someone was too lazy o look.
